report.name: pca4sst

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select distinct 'pagea', decode(substr(LPAD(:p_param6, 7, '0'), 5, 2), '**', (S.sigdep || '/' || S.sigpole), S.libdsg) dc_libdeppole, decode(substr(TO_CHAR(pro.pdsg, 'FM0000000'), 6, 2), '**', (S2.sigdep || '/' || S2.sigpole), S2.libdsg) PROLIBDPG, cm.clisigle DirMO, substr(to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'),1,5) CODEDP, lb.pcle CLE, lb.metier METIER, lb.clicode PCMOUVRA, lb.pid PID, lb.typproj TYPPROJ, lb.arctype TYPE2, lb.codcamo CODCAMO, rpad(lb.pnom,25) LIBPROJET, to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000') CODEDPG, rpad(r.rnom,12) CHEFPROJET, cout.consojh JHCONS, cout.reestjh JHREEST, round(cout.conso_ke,0) CONSOJH, round(cout.reest_ke,0) REESTJH, round(cout.propo_ke,0) PROPOJH, round(cout.notif_ke,0) NOTIFJH, round(cout.propomo_ke,0) PROPOMOJH, round(cout.arbit_ke,0) ARBITJH, round(cout.propo_anneeplusun_ke,0) PROPOJH1, round(cout.propomo_anneeplusun_ke,0) PROPOMOJH1, pro.pid PROPID, pro.aist AIST, pro.pcpi PROCPIDENT, pro.pdsg PROCODSG, rpad(r2.rnom,12) PROCP, round(cout.proconso_ke,0) PROCONSO from ligne_bip lb , proplus pro, struct_info S, struct_info S2, proj_info pri , budget budg , budget budg1 , consomme conso , ressource r , ressource r2 , client_mo cm , tmp_coutke_etats cout where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and S.codsg= lb.codsg and lb.pid=pro.factpid(+) and to_char(pro.cdeb(+),'yyyy') = :P_ANNEE and pro.pcpi=r2.ident(+) and S2.codsg(+)= pro.pdsg and lb.clicode = cm.clicode and lb.pcpi = r.ident and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and lb.typproj!=9 and ( ( conso.cusag <> 0 AND conso.cusag is not null ) OR ( budg.reestime <> 0 AND budg.reestime is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg.bpmontme is not null ) OR ( budg.bnmont <> 0 AND budg.bnmont is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg.bpmontmo is not null ) OR (budg.anmont <> 0 AND budg.anmont is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontme is not null) OR (budg1.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontmo is not null) ) and cout.pid = lb.pid and cout.codsg = lb.codsg and cout.metier = lb.metier AND ( pro.pcpi IS NULL OR cout.pcpi = pro.pcpi ) and lb.typproj!=7 and trim(lb.metier) != 'FOR' and cout.numseq = :P_NUMSEQ &p_where order by CODEDP, PCMOUVRA, PID, CODCAMO, LIBPROJET, CODEDPG, CHEFPROJET,PROPID ;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( substr ( LPAD ( : p_param6 , 7 , '0' ) , 5 , 2 ) , '**' , ( S.sigdep || '/' || S.sigpole ) , S.libdsg )
decode ( substr ( TO_CHAR ( pro.pdsg , 'FM0000000' ) , 6 , 2 ) , '**' , ( S2.sigdep || '/' || S2.sigpole ) , S2.libdsg )

dataSource.name: Q_typproj
dataSource.select: select 'pageb', decode(substr(LPAD(:p_param6, 7, '0'),6,2), '**', (S.sigdep || '/' || S.sigpole), S.libdsg) dc_libdeppoleb, substr(to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'),1,5) CODEDPb, lb.typproj PTYPEb, lb.arctype TYPE2b, round(cout.conso_ke ,0) CONSOJHb, round( cout.reest_ke ,0) REESTJHb, round(cout.propo_ke ,0) PROPOJHb, round(cout.notif_ke ,0) NOTIFJHb, round(cout.propomo_ke ,0) PROPOMOJHb, round(cout.arbit_ke ,0) ARBITJHb, round(cout.propo_anneeplusun_ke ,0) PROPOJH1b, round( cout.propomo_anneeplusun_ke ,0) PROPOMOJH1b from ligne_bip lb , struct_info S, proj_info pri , budget budg , budget budg1 , consomme conso , tmp_coutke_etats cout where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and S.codsg = lb.codsg and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and lb.typproj!=9 and ( ( conso.cusag <> 0 AND conso.cusag is not null ) OR ( budg.reestime <> 0 AND budg.reestime is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg.bpmontme is not null ) OR ( budg.bnmont <> 0 AND budg.bnmont is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg.bpmontmo is not null ) OR (budg.anmont <> 0 AND budg.anmont is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontme is not null) OR (budg1.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontmo is not null) ) and cout.pid = lb.pid and cout.codsg = lb.codsg and cout.metier = lb.metier and lb.typproj!=7 and trim(lb.metier) != 'FOR' and cout.numseq = :P_NUMSEQ &P_where

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( substr ( LPAD ( : p_param6 , 7 , '0' ) , 6 , 2 ) , '**' , ( S.sigdep || '/' || S.sigpole ) , S.libdsg )

dataSource.name: Q_final
dataSource.select: select lb.typproj PTYPEc, round( sum(nvl(cout.conso_ke,0)) ,0) CONSOJHc, round( sum(nvl(cout.reest_ke,0)) ,0) REESTJHc, round(sum(nvl(cout.propo_ke,0)) ,0) PROPOJHc, round( sum(nvl(cout.notif_ke,0)) ,0) NOTIFJHc, round(sum(nvl(cout.propomo_ke,0)) ,0) PROPOMOJHc, round(sum(nvl(cout.arbit_ke,0)) ,0) ARBITJHc, round(sum(nvl(cout.propo_anneeplusun_ke,0)) ,0) PROPOJH1c, round(sum(nvl(cout.propomo_anneeplusun_ke,0)) ,0) PROPOMOJH1c from ligne_bip lb , proj_info pri , budget budg , budget budg1 , consomme conso , tmp_coutke_etats cout where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and lb.typproj!=9 and ( ( conso.cusag <> 0 AND conso.cusag is not null ) OR ( budg.reestime <> 0 AND budg.reestime is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg.bpmontme is not null ) OR ( budg.bnmont <> 0 AND budg.bnmont is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg.bpmontmo is not null ) OR (budg.anmont <> 0 AND budg.anmont is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontme is not null) OR (budg1.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontmo is not null) ) and cout.pid = lb.pid and cout.codsg = lb.codsg and cout.metier = lb.metier and lb.typproj!=7 and trim(lb.metier) != 'FOR' and cout.numseq = :P_NUMSEQ &P_where group by lb.typproj;
